name: Super Cube 3D (itch)
description:
The game is in Early Access. For errors and bugs in the game, write here supercube3dcontact@gmail.com.

The game currently has 3 easy levels. We plan to release the game by 2022.

You are a cube. Your task is to go to the exit. But you are hindered by evil cubes that you need to control (WASD and arrows) The game is absolutely free. But if you want to support a developer, you can donate $ 2. Thanks
